newsitem.title: USA: Flanders files for 1.6 million shares.
newsitem.headline: Flanders files for 1.6 million shares.

text.p: Flanders Corp filed Wednesday a registration with the Securities and Exchange Commission to sell up 1.6 million common shares.

An additional 1,333,889 common shares are being registered for resale from time to time on behalf of certain selling shareholders, including the company's top executives, the company stated in the filing.
The company currently tradeson Nasdaq small-cap market. It has applied to have its common stock listed on Nasdaq's national market immediately before the offering.

Flanders granted the underwriters an over-allotment option of 240,000 additional common shares. The offering will be made through Gilford Securities Inc. After the offering, the outstanding shares will total 17,538,348 common.
Proceeds will be used to repay debt.
The Washington, N.C., company designs, makes and markets air filtration products.
